name: BadStepmom
0:
”Alexa tell Bad Stepmom to remind me to party on today”
”Alexa ask Bad Stepmom to define experiment”
”Alexa tell Bad Stepmom hello.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bad stepmom
des:
Bad Stepmom is an unhelpful skill that is more than a little mean. It exists primarily to be snarky and deny your requests. However, it does have two pieces of regular functionality.

- It can set reminders. However, it will only tell you about those reminders the first time it is opened after the reminder has expired.

- It can define words using the Oxford English Dictionary API. These definitions are presented in a condescending manner.

It can also accept a wide variety of requests for many other things, but it will always give a snarky denial for any of those requests.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
